title: Heaven of time
desc: I believe, for every drop of rainï¼Œthat falls, A flower grows...

title: Heaven of time
desc: I believe that somewhere in the darkest night, A candle glows...

title: I Believe
desc: I believe for everyone who goes astray, Someone will come, to show the way, I believe, I believe...

title: Still Be Heard
desc: I believe, above the storm the smallest prayer, Will still be heard...

title: I Believe
desc: I believe, that someone in that great somewhere, Hears every word...

title: Hope whispers
desc: Hope whispers and I will follow, Till you love me too...

title: Winter Light
desc: Star glowing in the twilight, Tell me true.

title: Suppose
desc: Suppose birds should fly in now, But they are not yet seen.

title: Love's Shadow
desc: Love's shadow will surround you, all through the night.

title: The Hearts
desc: Hearts call, hearts fall, swallowed in the rain.

title: Winter light
desc: Bear witness to salvation, And life starts over again.

title: The Clear Sky
desc: Now the clear sky is all around you, Aah aah...

title: Spring's Cheat
desc: Suppose Spring has learn to cheat, Then the earth would say: this is not spring.

title: Keeps Silent
desc: Suppose the rooster is itching to crow, But it keeps silent.

title: Winter Light
desc: Wandering in the winter light, the wicked and the sane.

title: Life Grows
desc: Who knows, life grows, hollow and so vain.
